document_data.caption: A map showing Sul Street and surroundings in the Sea Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Sul Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Sul Street''' was a large road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Sul Street was located in the east section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]] with a small portion extending into the [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]]. It ran north to south, nearly through the entire length of the ward. Sul Street originated on [[Skulls Street]] where it branched south and terminated on [[Trader's Way (Waterdeep)|Trader's Way]] just north of the [[Market (Waterdeep)|Market]]. It was intersected by many other roads including [[Wrightstone Street]], [[Chasso's Trot]], [[Vondil Street]], [[Delzorin Street]], [[the Rough Road]], [[Sulmor Street]], [[Zarimtar Street]], [[Hassantyr's Street]], [[Whim Street]], [[Julthoon Street]], [[Heard Lane]], and [[Manycats Alley]].
